content: securing the other end later now take your crochet hook back up to r03/r04 comb surface crochet to attach the working yarn over r03 push your hook down into r03/r04 and come back out directly above in r02/r03 pull a loop up and ch1 picot 3 surface crochet 1sc on r01 keeping as central as possible picot 3 surface crochet 1sc on r02 at the back keeping as central as possible picot 3 surface crochet 1sc on r04 pull through and cut leaving a tail attach a needle and take the yarn down through the stitch on r04 you just pulled a loop down into and secure mfadreileenindes & p7/8 madeleine & friends pattern insignia or combadge i based this on the deep space nine era combadge though it s so small it works for the next generation era combadges which have a solid rounded gold back embroider at least 5 gold stitches a little to the right you right and several rounds below the eye for exact position i ve placed the science blue s badge between r10 and r11 and across the post of the 21st stitch but place it wherever looks best for your little chicken next add the silver part by embroidering a small silver arrowhead over the gold if you can manage to get the proportions spot on awesome i didn t bother both sides of my silver arrowhead are the same length secure the floss tails and you re done enjoy you new little starfleet friend mfadreileenindes & p8/8
